meanings: in an instant, in a twinkling, in[like] a flash, in the blink[twinkling] of an eye
finish a sandwich in a twinkling
devour three bowls of noodles in a moment

vlive.korean: [순간의 실수로 순식간에 밀려나는 냉정한 세계] 돌아갔어! [Got out of the race in a moment] I'm spinning! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [Got out of the race in a moment] I'm spinning!

vlive.korean: [그 사이 기적처럼 7등 복귀] 나 순식간에 또 7등이야? [Came in 7th place like a miracle] I'm in 7th place again? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [Came in 7th place like a miracle] I'm in 7th place again?

vlive.korean: 순식간에 쓰레기를 몇 개나 만들어낸 거야? How much trash did I make in an instant? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 오늘은 뭐할까요??
vlive.english: How much trash did I make in an instant?

vlive.korean: [순식간에 복작복작 가득찬 화면 이게 바로 세븐틴이 주는 안정감이다] - 안녕 - 하이! [They've filled the screen. I feel safe now] - Hi. - Hi! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] 🐱아 전원우 귀여움이 잇츠 더블더블!!😺 (WONWOO’s Q&A time)
vlive.english: [They've filled the screen. I feel safe now] - Hi. - Hi!

vlive.korean: [수줍] [순식간에 태경의 아영 씨가 된 아영] 우리 아영 씨 너무 예쁘죠? [Shy] [Ayoung suddenly became Taekyung's] My Ayoung is so pretty, isn't she? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 핫하다 못해 뜨거운 우리 대표님을 소개합니다 [가두리횟집] VLOG 02
vlive.english: [Shy] [Ayoung suddenly became Taekyung's] My Ayoung is so pretty, isn't she?

examples.korean: the runaway success of her first play 발음듣기 순식간에 성공을 거둔 그녀의 첫 연극 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the runaway success of her first play 발음

examples.korean: The children demolished their burgers and chips. 발음듣기 아이들은 버거와 칩스를 순식간에 먹어 치웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The children demolished their burgers and chips. 발음

examples.korean: The band rocketed to stardom with their first single. 발음듣기 그 밴드는 처음 내놓은 싱글 음반으로 순식간에 스타가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The band rocketed to stardom with their first single. 발음

examples.korean: Hotel costs gobbled up most of their holiday budget. 발음듣기 호텔비가 그들의 휴가 경비 대부분을 순식간에 잡아먹었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hotel costs gobbled up most of their holiday budget. 발음

examples.korean: He was gone in a trice. 발음듣기 그는 순식간에 사라져 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was gone in a trice. 발음
